summary: A CIA assassin attempts to break out of the contract killing business to try to lead a normal life.

Anthony Joseph|Steve Boergadine|Wolf Muser|Lee Sherman|Paul Cram|Justin Smith|Corey Beauregard|David Bermejo|Julia Denton|Scott duPont|Jamie Marie Roebuck Joseph|Elizabeth Judith|Jillian Kinsman|Chase Link|Russell D. Mercier|Randy Molnar|Randy Robinson|Marc Shapins|Kim R. Smith|Leander Suleiman|Valensky Sylvain|Brewier Welch|Jeremy Wood
title: Contract Killers
